column1: The city currently has six elementary schools
column2: four middle/junior high schools and two high schools
column3: Reynoldsburg High School. The high school and junior high schools' mascot is Rocky Raider (a pirate) and its colors are purple and gold.The City Parks and Recreation Department is responsible for 275 acres of parkland including 9 major parks. Established in 1948 the first Franklin County Metro Park opened in Reynoldsburg
column4: Blacklick Woods and Blacklick Woods Golf Course; a 643-acre park with Golf

column9: with a total of 70 sworn officers
column12: is located next to City Hall. According to the city's Annual Report
column13: the City tallied six murders in 2016
column16: and two in 2019.  All of these cases have been solved. Curtis Baker serves as the current Chief of the Division. Chief Baker and prior chief David Plesich are credited with creating a professional police force that has developed a visible presence in community policing leading to a significant reduction in crime rates.  The agency currently has a Motor Unit (with four cycles)
column21: Community Resource Officers (two located at sub-stations)
column24: and fields a joint SWAT team with Whitehall Police.  RPD has been an innovator in central Ohio.  The agency's primary community outreach program is its Illumination Project
column27: RPD opens its doors to welcome the community in for Q and A sessions with the Chief or information sharing. RPD was the first agency in central Ohio to begin a security camera registration program
column28: allowing RPD detectives to quickly ascertain potential leads (video that may have captured crime).  The agency is also one of a very few that has published a five-year strategic plan
column29: which is posted on the agency's website.  Other changes implemented in 2019 include a cold case review
column32: and a lateral hiring program.The Ohio Department of Agriculture
column33: the Ohio Fire Academy and the State Fire Marshal's offices are also located in Reynoldsburg.

column1: Reynoldsburg is known as "The Birthplace of the Tomato"
column2: claiming the first commercial variety of tomato was bred there in the 19th century. and the Tomato Festival has been held every year since 1965. Every year there is a Tomato Festival Queen. The Tomato Festival takes place in August.

column1: L Brands is the largest employer in Reynoldsburg. Subsequently
column2: its subsidiary Bath & Body Works and Victoria's Secret are  headquartered in Reynoldsburg.
